page.title: 16Springfield Politics
page.content: The{Community Council}is made up of 9 elected members, who serve for 3 years. Its function is to help residents with problems or deal with any complaints. It meets once a month and its meetings are open to the public, although few people attend. The Community Council can report any damage to roads, pavements and public areas to the{District Council.}It can help tenants of Council Houses to get repairs done by contacting the District Council for them. The Community Council organises events to raise money for local improvements. Such an event would be a sponsored walk. It looks over plans for any new buildings. It can see to the replacement of street signs. It can make sure that the village has sufficent public transport.
